attributes.action: ensure the government invests immediately in heavy ion therapy for the drastic improvement of survival rates for the treatment of a large variety of cancers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heavy ion therapy can be used to treat a variety of cancers with more success than traditional methods. For example, with liver tumour treatments the survival rate is improved from 23% to 100%. Such instruments are expensive, but given that they are currently being applied to conditions such as prostate cancer which is thought to affect 50% of males, the investment is essential. Germany and the US both already have some.
